game.name: Shiny The Firefly
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Shiny the Firefly is a challenging platform adventure game. Journey through a mysterious garden as Shiny, a brave firefly on a quest to find his children, lost in a terrible accident. Master trials,solve puzzles and use your stealth to guide your children to safety.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Shiny the Firefly is a challenging platform adventure game. Journey through a mysterious garden as Shiny, a brave firefly on a quest to find his children, lost in a terrible accident. Master trials,solve puzzles and use your stealth to guide your children to safety.

reviewHighlights.text: 반딧불이 수집 게임. 오직 마우스로만 플레이. 반딧불이가 되어 맵을 돌아다니면서 작은 반딧불이를 찾습니다. 반딧불이를 누르면 엉덩이에 불이 들어오고, 작은 반딧불이와 가까워지면 알아서 따라다니죠. 방해하는 거미와 모기, 공격하는 벌을 피해다니면서 꽃으로 이동하면 클리어...
